RootLayout.title: Oikion
RootLayout.description: Oikion is the operating system for Greek real-estate agencies. MLS, CRM, and Socials in one web app.

alreadySignedIn.title: You're already signed in!
alreadySignedIn.description: You have an active session. Click below to return to your dashboard.

ReportsPage.description: Predefined reports for each module. We use Tremor for data visualization.
ReportsPage.newUsersByMonthOverall: Number of new users by month (Overall)
ReportsPage.newUsersByMonth2023: Number of new users by month (2023)
ReportsPage.newUsersByMonth2024: Number of new users by month (2024)

DashboardPage.containerDescription: Welcome to Oikion, here you can see all important information about your real estate agency.

validation.areaOrPostalCodeRequired: Area or postal code is required

client.description: Fill in the basic information to quickly create a client

property.title: Quick Add Property

Notifications.noNotificationsDesc: You don't have any notifications yet.

admin.title: Administration
admin.accessDenied: You are not an organization admin
admin.setupDescription: Manage your organization settings and members
admin.manageUsersDescription: Here you can manage your Oikion users
admin.manageOrgMembersDescription: Manage organization members and their roles
admin.manageModulesDescription: Configure which modules are visible in your organization
admin.noOrganizationContext: No organization context. Please select an organization.
admin.fullAccessDescription: Full access to organization settings and members
admin.teamManagementDescription: Invite members, manage roles and permissions

versionInfo.title: Version {version}
versionInfo.description: This is the very first version of Oikion. As we're just getting started, some actions might not work perfectly or could cause unexpected results. If you encounter any issues, please let us know through this feedback form. Your patience and feedback help us improve the app for everyone.

fields.feedbackType: What type of feedback is this?
fields.feedbackPlaceholder: Please share your thoughts, report a bug, suggest a feature, or ask a question...

descriptions.feedbackType: Choose the category that best describes your feedback
descriptions.feedback: Be as detailed as possible so we can better understand and address your feedback

messages.success: Thank you for your feedback. We appreciate your help in making Oikion better!
messages.error: Something went wrong. Please try again later.

validation.feedbackRequired: Feedback must be at least 10 characters.

inviteUser.previewText: You have been invited by {invitedBy} to Oikion app
inviteUser.heading: You have been invited to cooperate on something special
inviteUser.acceptInvitation: To accept this invitation, click the button below. And use this password to login:
inviteUser.orCopyUrl: or copy and paste this URL into your browser:
inviteUser.notExpecting: If you were not expecting this invitation, you can ignore this email. If you are concerned about your account's safety, please reply to this email to get in touch with us.

Landing.title: Oikion - The Operating System for Real Estate Agencies
Landing.description: MLS, CRM, and Socials in one web app for Greek real estate agencies

hero.title: The Operating System for Real Estate Agencies
hero.subtitle: MLS, CRM, and Socials in one unified platform. Manage properties, clients, and your team efficiently.

features.title: Everything You Need
features.subtitle: One platform for all your real estate agency needs

mls.title: Property Management (MLS)
mls.description: List and manage your properties with ease. Filters, search, and quick editing.

crm.title: Client Management (CRM)
crm.description: Track your clients, interactions, and tasks in one place.

analytics.title: Reports & Analytics
analytics.description: Monitor your agency's performance with detailed reports and charts.
